name: Italian Egg Drop Soup (Stracciatella)
description: Stracciatella (strah-CH'YAH-the-lah) means "little rags". When you add the egg and Parmesan mixture, it makes rag-like shreds of dough that are cooked in broth.
preparation: Bring Chicken Broth to boil in a large Multipurpose Pot. Season to taste with Salt and Pepper.
In a small mixing bowl, whisk eggs, grated Parmesan cheese and SPG Seasoning.
Reduce temperature to a simmer. Using a fork, slowly stir egg mixture into simmering broth. Continue to stir until egg floats to the top. Serve immediately.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!
